{{champion:105}} mmmmmm, good enough to eat!
I ***AM*** evil, stop laughing! - {{champion:45}}
Thanks for giving us the {{champion:45}} skin first, Riot! No chance you'll do a champ first then it's skin in the following sale rotation? Hmph.
Bruh, D'ya really need the sale for Veigar???

Ranged
Melee
Tanky DPS
Assassin
Mage
Tank
Support
and Jungler all wrapped up in one defective man.
These champs are just too good; they gave Jax a lamp post an Lee Sin a blindfold.

Streetlights OP.
{{champion:24}} Rito nerf
No they just need to ask jax to use a squirrel or something like that this time. Or mabey a teemoooo...
Hahahaha! I could see Jax tossing Teemo around.
{{champion:17}} Fights with mushrooms and blow darts.
blow darts are an actually weapon. Have you ever heard of anyone going to war with public property or with a old rag? Jax and Lee win that one.

I know but its still an improbable weapon. How many people do you see using blow darts today (and mushrooms?) Between blow darts and a brass lamp post I would actually pick the lamp post. Unless I were Teemo. Then I would be the Teemo that is meant to be the Teemo that is Teemo.

Next Updated splashes need to be Blitzcrank, Anivia and Udyr

Sivir, Zillian, and Blitz.
Sivir doesn't need a splash update; she was just relaunched last year if I'm not mistaken. Her skins, barring Snowstorm, could use an update, but her main looks perfect.
Okay, I got first comment let's see post something smart.... Hmmmm.... DARNIT SOMEONE ELSE JUST POSTED >:[
You're to slow!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Hey no story today lightdragoon88?

Sorry. These sales appear at 10:00 AM where I am and I have work at 11:00 AM Thursday mornings. So as much as I would like to make a story, I just don't have the time on Thursday anymore. :( 

That is why I am trying to make the ones for Monday bigger to make up for it.
Pls tell me that's not the sonic taunt....
Ok...I won't tell you then.
